T11dhksparu:0: Explanatory Remarks A number of five figures at the left side indicates the location of the key word in the basic texts. In the case of the SV, the HB and the VN, the first three figures indicate the page number, and the last two indicate the line number (for
T11dhksparu:2: SV16026=SV 160,26; HB02314=HB 23,14; VN06110=VN 61,10). In the case of the PV and the NB, the second figure indicates the chapter number and the last three figures indicate the karika or sutra number (for example, PV02232=PV, the
T11dhksparu:3: Pramanasiddhi-chapter v.232; NB03015=NB, the Pararthanumana-chapter sutra
T11dhksparu:4: In the case of the SP, the last two figures indicate the karika number (for example,
T11dhksparu:5: 3. In this database, sentences are artificially divided into word-units,
T11dhksparu:6: although they involve a phonetic fusion or union in the basic texts. Further, compound words
T11dhksparu:7: divided into their shortest constitutive elements (we use a hyphen to indicate that
T11dhksparu:8: hyphenated elements originally form a compound word) with the following
T11dhksparu:10: 3.1. The prefixes a-, dur-, nih- remain undivided, irrespective of attachment to words or compound words.
T11dhksparu:11: 3.2. Suffixes making an adverb, for example -vat, -vasa, are divided. But suffixes making a possessive adjective, for example -vat, -mat, remain undivided,
T11dhksparu:12: and terms such as a numeral+ -dha/-vidha/-prakara remain also undivided.
T11dhksparu:13: 3.3. Compound words with the suffixes -ta/-tva or -bhava/-bhuta
T11dhksparu:14: fundamentally remain undivided. For example: karyakaranabhava/-bhuta/-ta.
T11dhksparu:15: 3.4. Compound words with evam-, tat-, tatha-, para-, yatha-, su-, sva- in the wordhead fundamentally remain undivided. For example: evamjatiya,
T11dhksparu:17: tathakrta, paratantra, yathartha, yathasvam, sujnanatva, svabhava.
T11dhksparu:18: 3.5. Some compound words which are regarded as terminology remain also
T11dhksparu:19: undivided. For example: agnihotra, ayogavyavaccheda, arthapatti, padartha,
T11dhksparu:22: 4. Those terms whose wordhead is subject to the Sandhi rules (for example,
T11dhksparu:24: dhetu-) are cited in their original form (for example, -d *hetu-) for the sake of using this database to make an KWIC index.
T11dhksparu:28: This database is quite a tentative one, and I must admit that there are a lot of errors and defects in this version. I would appreciate it very much if the user would point out any errors in this version so that we can make a better new
T11dhksparu:32: 00001 pāratantryaṃ hi sambandhaḥ siddhe kā paratantratā
T11dhksparu:33: 00001 tasmāt sarvasya bhāvasya sambandho na asti tattvataḥ
T11dhksparu:34: 00002 rūpa-śleṣo hi sambandho dvitve sa ca kathaṃ bhavet
T11dhksparu:35: 00002 tasmāt prakṛti-bhinnānāṃ sambandho na asti tattvataḥ
T11dhksparu:36: 00003 para-apekṣā hi sambandhaḥ so asan katham apekṣate
T11dhksparu:37: 00003 saṃś ca sarva-nirāśaṃso bhāvaḥ katham apekṣate
T11dhksparu:39: 00004 kaḥ sambandho anavasthā ca na sambandha-matis tathā
T11dhksparu:40: 00005 tau ca bhāvau tad-anyaś ca sarve te sva-ātmani sthitāḥ
T11dhksparu:41: 00005 ity amiśrāḥ svayaṃ bhāvās tān miśrayati kalpanā
T11dhksparu:43: 00006 bhāva-bheda-pratīty-arthaṃ saṃyojyante abhidhāyakāḥ 00007 kāryakāraṇabhāvo api tayor
T11dhksparu:44: 00007 prasiddhyati kathaṃ dviṣṭho adviṣṭhe sambandhatā katham
T11dhksparu:46: 00008 tadbhāve api tad-bhāvāt sambandho na eka-vṛttimān
T11dhksparu:47: 00009 yady apekṣya tayor ekam anyatra asau pravartate
T11dhksparu:48: 00009 upakārī hy apekṣyaḥ syāt kathaṃ ca upakaroty asan 00010 yady eka-artha-abhisambandhāt kāryakāraṇatā tayoḥ 00010 prāptā dvitva-ādi-sambandhāt savyetara-viśāṇayoḥ
T11dhksparu:49: 00011 dviṣṭho hi kaścit sambandho na ato anyat tasya lakṣaṇam
T11dhksparu:51: 00012 yoga-upādhī na tāv eva kāryakāraṇatā atra kim
T11dhksparu:52: 00012 bhedāc cen nanv ayaṃ śabdo niyoktāraṃ samāśritaḥ
T11dhksparu:54: 00013 apaśyat kāryam anveti vinā vyākhyātṛbhir janaḥ
T11dhksparu:59: 00016 bhāve bhāvini tad-bhāvo bhāva eva ca bhāvitā
T11dhksparu:62: 00017 vikalpā darśayanty arthān mithyā-arthā ghaṭitān iva 00018 bhinne kā ghaṭanā abhinne kāryakāraṇatā api kā
T11dhksparu:63: 00018 bhāve hy anyasya viśliṣṭau śilaṣṭau syātāṃ kathaṃ ca tau
T11dhksparu:65: 00019 anyonya-anupakārāc ca na sambandhī ca tādṛśaḥ 00020 janane api hi kāryasya kenacit
T11dhksparu:66: 00020 samavāyī tadā na asau na tato atiprasaṅgataḥ
T11dhksparu:67: 00021 tayor anupakāre api samavāye paratra vā
T11dhksparu:68: 00021 sambandho yadi viśvaṃ syāt samavāyi parasparam
T11dhksparu:69: 00022 saṃyoga-janane api iṣṭau tataḥ saṃyoginau na tau
T11dhksparu:71: 00023 saṃyoga-ādy-āśraye yogyam ayogyaṃ tac ca jāyate 00023 nityaṃ yogya-svabhāvasya tad-vaikalya-virodhataḥ
T11dhksparu:74: 00025 teṣu satsv api tasya iti sambandhasya aprasiddhitaḥ
